task.title: How to Add a Facebook Like Button in WebHelp Output
task.shortdesc: See how you can add a Facebook widget into WebHelp output.

context.p: To add a Facebook Like widget to your WebHelp output, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Fill-in the displayed form, then click the Get Code button.
step.stepresult: A dialog containing code snippets is displayed.

step.cmd: Copy the two code snippets into a <div> element inside an XML file called facebook-widget.xml.
Duplicate an existing WebHelp transformation scenario (depending on your needs, it may be with or without feedback, or the mobile variant).
Switch to the Parameters tab and edit the webhelp.footer.file parameter to reference the facebook-widget.xml file created earlier.
